name: Station 99
description:
Station 99 is an action-adventure game with first-person shooter (FPS) elements. You have to take on the role of an ordinary soldier and go to station 99 where something strange is happening. Explore mysterious locations and do everything necessary to keep the station safe!

Fight hordes of monsters and bosses with a versatile weapon! Carefully explore the locations, but be careful, danger can be waiting around every corner.

Peculiarities
- Pleasant music
- Colorful graphics
- Dangerous opponents
